issue.title: multisense plugin (resolution, update rate, stereo alg, ...)

content.raw:
Consulting my notes from CRL, we need to install publication of depth image over ros topic

`/multisense_sl/depth/depth`  ([sensor_msgs/Image](http://www.ros.org/doc/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/Image.html))

replacing standard disparity image per [REP 118](http://ros.org/reps/rep-0118.html)

and subtopics

`/multisense_sl/depth/depth/compressed`,  `/multisense_sl/depth/depth/theora` for use with [image_transport](http://www.ros.org/wiki/image_transport).
content.html:
Consulting my notes from CRL, we need to install publication of depth image over ros topic

/multisense_sl/depth/depth (sensor_msgs/Image)

replacing standard disparity image per REP 118

and subtopics

/multisense_sl/depth/depth/compressed, /multisense_sl/depth/depth/theora for use with image_transport.
